name: Low-Angle Camera Shot
description: Camera positioned below subject looking up, creating power and dominance

prompt.base: Low-angle shot, camera looking up at subject, ground-level camera position, upward perspective, subject appears powerful, heroic framing, worms-eye angle, empowering perspective
prompt.positive: low angle shot, camera below subject, looking up, ground-level perspective, upward view, subject dominance, powerful appearance, heroic framing, worms-eye view, empowering angle, towering presence

technical.use_cases: Heroic moments, villain introduction, power dynamics

examples: A superhero standing tall, camera low looking up, powerful framing, heroic perspective
A villain towering over camera, low angle emphasizing dominance, intimidating presence
